name: Unreliable Witness
description:
One witness is a liar

Find out who the criminal is.

Controls

Press space to switch between suspects.


DISCLAIMER:

The game was posted with a variety of bugs which makes it almost unplayable, if you want to play an improved version do so here but do not take this into your voting results.
https://barney25052.itch.io/unreliable-web-version
